website_summaries.verdict: Provides a biodegradable resting spot for pet fish and comes with a low price. A respectful way to lay family pet fish to rest.
pros: Made of environmentally friendly, biodegradable rice husk and bamboo fiber
Designed for pet fish in a suitable fish design
spacious enough for pets several inches in size
Comes with a seeded memory card
cons: Limited to pet fish, but if you have a beloved aquatic pet, it's the one to get

customer_reviews.title: Should have bigger sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I know it sounds kinda strange, but I just buried a "Feeder Goldfish" of 13 years. To me, that's a special event in my life. To others, eh..it's just a fish. Anyway, these are thoughtful and nice, just not big enough. I had to almost squeeze my fish to fit in it, (not that it matters now).. He defied all logic by surviving all these years, so I wanted to do something special for him..RIP Gilbert..<><
customer_reviews.author: Cold War Veteran MP

customer_reviews.title: Deliver your beloved pet to their final resting place with dignity.
customer_reviews.text: We just laid our beloved Betta fish Sammy to rest in his little fish pod this evening. The fish pod helped us give Sammy a dignified send off and I'm so glad that it was able to arrive as fast as it did. Sammy passed away suddenly at the ripe old age of 4. I love you Sammy.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Kingery

customer_reviews.title: Great way to say goodbye and memorialize one’s pet
customer_reviews.text: I got a fish pod for my betta because I thought he deserved more than being flushed away, and I was very happy with this product. The fish pod was a cute shape and very easy to open. It also came with a nice card that I used as a grave marker until the flower seeds (that also came with the pod) start to bloom. I love that the pod is biodegradable and comes with flower seeds to grow so I can always remember my pet <3
customer_reviews.author: Staffylove56

customer_reviews.title: DARLING & RESPECTFUL
customer_reviews.text: My little girl's sweet Betta fish we called "Rainbow" passed away. We needed to see him off with love & respect so I got him this special, earth-friendly, casket. My daughter was able to decorate it to say goodbye in her own special way before I laid him to rest inside. We then gave him a proper burial in a pretty pot where we planted the included perennial flower seedling leaf. We look forward to seeing Rainbow's flowers bloom as beautiful as he was. WONDERFUL ITEM. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: AprilP

customer_reviews.title: For small fish only
customer_reviews.text: This item is only good for small fish. We received our order fast but was sadden to see our 6in gold fish was not going to fit in the urn. They don't show pictures of the bottom of the urn. From their pictures it looked big enough.
customer_reviews.author: Yaina

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this once before with no problem, but the second time I ordered it, I received an empty plastic case. I hadn’t opened the package right away and now it is past the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy construction and roomy
customer_reviews.text: sturdy large enough for Jonah looks nice. Haven't had to use it but will be available. for Jonah's final resting place .
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bengtson

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a betta fish
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than I thought but it still worked for my betta. SIP little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but made my son happy.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty expensive for what it actually is... but a nice thing to have for my son's first pet burial. So overall worth the money because he felt like Dory was actually getting a burial and not just flushed down the toilet...
customer_reviews.author: D. Hansberry

customer_reviews.title: It’s hard
customer_reviews.text: I see a lot Of kids and parents getting this. I’m a college student balling my eyes out, burying my betta fish named Sherlock. Seems pretty useful, for on friends account but review here
customer_reviews.author: Amber

product_meta.title: Paw Pods Pet Fish Casket | Biodegradable Fish Casket With Sympathy Card And Seeded Leaf | Plant The Seed For A Living Memorial Pet Grave Marker | Fish Pod Fish Coffin
feature_bullets: 【PET MEMORIAL CASKET】 A dignified way to preserve the memory of a beloved pet fish. Gone but never forgotten with a beautiful pet casket that doesn’t harm the environment.
【4.75 inches x 2.9 inches x 2 inches (LxWxH)】 High quality casket to fit a small to medium size fish, such as goldfish, betta / beta fish, African cichlid, guppy, or similarly sized pets.

【INCLUDES WILDFLOWER MEMORIAL】 Each pet casket includes a memorial card and seeded leaf designed for planting with the PawPod. The leaf grows perennial wildflowers as a living memorial grave marker to your pet.

【BIODEGRADABLE】 Made of bamboo powder, rice husk, and cornstarch, the pet casket is very strong and durable. Harmless to the environment, PawPods will fully degrade in 3-5 years after the coffin is buried.

【TEACHING TOOL FOR KIDS】Featured in the New York Times and Hallmark Channel, PawPods are a perfect tool to help teach kids about the circle of life. PawPods can be decorated with paints, markers, and stickers, allowing for a special personalized and unique way to say goodbye.to their pet fish
